taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species whartoniae;

treatment.description: Habitally similar to no. 44; prickles stouter; primocane-leaflets coarsely dentate, the terminal one with about 25 broad-based low simple or slightly notched teeth; flowers 3-5, much overtopping bracteal leaves; petals 5-7 mm. broad.
